1-cost.name: Splash
1-cost.effect: Roll (1d4), a 3 or 4  casts another random 1 cost spell

1-cost.name: Gust
1-cost.effect: Re-activate a spent non-wind die at random

2-cost.name: Blaze
2-cost.effect: Deal (1d10) damage

2-cost.name: Fireballs
2-cost.effect: Deal (2d4) + 1 damage

2-cost.name: Bigger Splash
2-cost.effect: Cast any two cost spell at random

2-cost.name: Wavepool
2-cost.effect: Remove (2d4) + 1 only from your opponents armour

2-cost.name: Wild Growth
2-cost.effect: Gain 2 armour for each previously spent dice, max of 8

2-cost.name: Rock Armour
2-cost.effect: Gain (1d4) + 4 armour

2-cost.name: Strong Gusts
2-cost.effect: Re-roll any 6 unspent dice

2-cost.name: Dust Devil
2-cost.effect: Call a number 1 through 4, roll (1d4), if the number matches deal 9 damage

2-cost.name: Unfair Duel
2-cost.effect: Roll (1d4), your opponent rolls (1d8), whoever rolls higher takes that amount as damage

2-cost.name: Shrunken Heads
2-cost.effect: Take 4 damage and return these dice to your hand, you may re-roll them

2-cost.name: Fated Hearts
2-cost.effect: Heal (1d6) + 2

2-cost.name: The Lovers
2-cost.effect: If your HP is 18 or higher heal to full

2-cost.name: Refreshing Sips
2-cost.effect: Gain (1d4) HP for each unspent dice in your hand, max of 10 HP

2-cost.name: Smog
2-cost.effect: Gain 3 armour and deal (1d4) damage

2-cost.name: Hotheaded
2-cost.effect: Roll (1d10), a 1 or 10 is taken as damage to you, anything else is damage to your opponent

2-cost.name: Risky Business
2-cost.effect: Take (1d4) damage and get triple that many re-rolls

2-cost.name: Hot Coals
2-cost.effect: Deal your current armour as damage, max of 8

2-cost.name: Waterjet
2-cost.effect: Get 3 re-rolls and deal 4 damage

2-cost.name: Aqua Mortis
2-cost.effect: Take (1d4) damage and deal (1d6) + 3 damage

2-cost.name: Self-Care
2-cost.effect: Gain (1d4) as armour and (1d4) as HP

2-cost.name: Quid-Pro-Quo
2-cost.effect: Choose to exchange up to 10 HP for 10 armour

2-cost.name: Burning Love
2-cost.effect: Deal 3 damage and heal 3 HP

2-cost.name: Even Sacrifice
2-cost.effect: Deal 3 damage, if your opponents HP is now even re-activate 1 non-death dice at random

2-cost.name: Scald
2-cost.effect: Deal (1d4) damage for each spent wind or death die, max of 10 damage

3-cost.name: Explosion
3-cost.effect: Take 3 damage, then deal (1d4) + (2d6) as damage to your opponent

3-cost.name: Neverending Vines
3-cost.effect: Roll (1d8) repeatedly until a 1 is rolled, gain armour equal to the number of rolls, max of 12 armour

3-cost.name: Second Chance
3-cost.effect: Roll (1d6) to be gained as HP and armour, if you roll a 1 or 2 re-roll a (1d6) + 2 and use that value instead

3-cost.name: Deadly Swamp
3-cost.effect: If your opponent has 9 or more armour, remove all of it

3-cost.name: Odd Rod
3-cost.effect: Roll (1d8) as damage, if the roll was an odd number roll an additional (1d6) as damage

3-cost.name: Even Steven
3-cost.effect: Roll (1d6) + 4 as damage, if the roll was an even number gain a re-roll

3-cost.name: Restorative Shock
3-cost.effect: Heal (1d8) + 2 and deal (1d6) damage

3-cost.name: Bloody Sacrifice
3-cost.effect: Sacrifice as much HP of your choosing without dying, then deal half that rounded down to your opponent as damage

3-cost.name: Downdraft
3-cost.effect: Roll (2d20), gain the lowest roll as armour, minimum of 5 armour

3-cost.name: Troubled Waters
3-cost.effect: Deal (1d6) + (1d12)  damage

3-cost.name: Merciful Strike
3-cost.effect: Deal (1d10) + 5 damage, your opponent then gains half your dice roll rounded down as armour

3-cost.name: Washed Ashore
3-cost.effect: Re-activate 4 random non-water dice

3-cost.name: Lucky Ritual
3-cost.effect: Take 7 damage, gain 7 armour, deal 7 damage

3-cost.name: High Stakes
3-cost.effect: Roll (3d6) heal any 3 or higher rolls, take damage on any 2 or less rolls

3-cost.name: Deadly Curse
3-cost.effect: Roll (1d8), deal as damage to you and 2x that to your opponent

3-cost.name: Healing Burst
3-cost.effect: Heal (1d6) + 7 HP

3-cost.name: Scorching Wind
3-cost.effect: Roll (3d12), deal the highest roll as damage

3-cost.name: Back From The Dead
3-cost.effect: Re-activate 3 non-death dice at random

3-cost.name: Balancing Act
3-cost.effect: If your HP is evenly divisible by your armour gain 5 for both

3-cost.name: Updraft
3-cost.effect: Take (1d6) damage, if damage was 3 or less deal (1d8) + 2 damage, else deal (1d12) + 3 damage

3-cost.name: Blood For Steel
3-cost.effect: Lose (1d6) HP, Gain 9 armour

3-cost.name: Steel Hearted
3-cost.effect: Gain HP equal to that of you or your opponents armour, max of 12 HP

3-cost.name: Undertow
3-cost.effect: Take 2 damage, then deal (2d6) damage

3-cost.name: Hot Steel
3-cost.effect: Gain (1d4) + 1 armour and deal double that as damage to your opponent

3-cost.name: Bay Of Leaves
3-cost.effect: Gain 3 armour and HP, gain 3 additional armour for each unspent water

3-cost.name: Firenado
3-cost.effect: Set your opponents armour to (1d4)

3-cost.name: Final Breath
3-cost.effect: Call a number 1 through 15 then roll (1d20), if your number was lower deal that as damage, if higher take that number as damage

4-cost.name: Thick Armour
4-cost.effect: Take (1d6) damage, if this did not reduce your HP deal (1d12) + 6 damage

4-cost.name: Fiery Passion
4-cost.effect: Deal (1d12) damage. If your HP is still lower then your opponent's re-activate both fires

4-cost.name: Deadlier Curse
4-cost.effect: Roll (2d6), deal as damage to you and 2x that to your opponent

4-cost.name: Fire Flower
4-cost.effect: Deal your opponents armour as direct damage to their HP, max of 13 damage

4-cost.name: Nullify
4-cost.effect: Gain (1d10) + 6 armour, if you gained 12 or more armour lose (1d6) HP

4-cost.name: Fertile Soil
4-cost.effect: Sacrifice as much armour as you choose. Deal that as damage to your opponent and gain half that rounded down as HP

4-cost.name: Even The Odds
4-cost.effect: Roll (3d10), deal 2 damage for each even roll and 5 for each odd roll

4-cost.name: Shield Bash
4-cost.effect: Deal your current armour + 3 as damage

4-cost.name: Total Coverage
4-cost.effect: Gain (1d6) + 1 armour, heal (1d6) + 1 HP, and deal (1d6) + 1 damage

4-cost.name: Monster Splash
4-cost.effect: Play any 4 cost spell at random

4-cost.name: Elemental Panic
4-cost.effect: Roll (1d10) + 5 and choose one: 1. deal as damage, 2. gain as armour, 3. heal as HP

4-cost.name: Lay On Hands
4-cost.effect: Roll (3d20) and heal the highest roll

4-cost.name: Soul Siphon
4-cost.effect: Roll (4d6), 1s or 2s are dealt as damage to you, 3 or higher is dealt as damage to your opponent

5-cost.name: Chain Lightning
5-cost.effect: Deal (1d4) damage, if roll was not a 4 deal (1d6) damage, if roll was not a 6 deal (1d12) damage

5-cost.name: Revive
5-cost.effect: Roll (3d6) 5s or higher are gained as HP, rolls 4 or lower are gained as armour

5-cost.name: Death & Taxes
5-cost.effect: Swap you and your opponents HP, if your opponent now has 5 HP or less they gain 7 armour

5-cost.name: Mudslide
5-cost.effect: Roll (1d4, 1d6, 1d8, 1d10, 1d12, 1d20) and deal the highest 3 rolls as damage, max of 24 damage

5-cost.name: Self Destruct
5-cost.effect: First take (1d20) damage then deal (3d10) damage to your opponent

5-cost.name: Eternal Bond
5-cost.effect: Gain your current HP as armour, max of 16 armour

5-cost.name: Tsunami
5-cost.effect: Set your opponents armour to 0 and deal (1d12) damage

5-cost.name: Drawing Dead
5-cost.effect: Roll (4d20), the lowest roll is dealt as damage to you and the highest as damage to your opponent
